title: Mother Secretly Captures Daughter's Beautiful Performance in Cathedral
content: Singer-songwriter Shukranada Gant was blissfully unaware that her mother was filming her as she played the piano and sang at Lincoln Cathedral in the UK. Shukranada sat down at the piano in the quiet cathedral and began to play one of her original songs. The beautiful lyrics echoed throughout the cathedral, showcasing her stunning voice. Credit: YouTube/Shukrananda via Storyful
